availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Coulson (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, carriage maker)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, carriage maker. Pennsylvania native. Married to Allean Hardin Coulson. Father of Rebecca Coulson, Margaret Coulson, Allean Coulson, John Coulson. Carriage Maker in Covington, Kenton County, in 1860. Employed Julia Ryan in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. X
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. X
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #001943299, p 86.
Find A Grave, "John M Coulson (c1827-c1881)," Memorial #175566723, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/175566723 (accessed February 13, 2019).
